title: Former Defense Secretary Heaps Criticism On Obama
teaser: Former Defense Secretary and CIA director Leon Panetta is promoting his new book and criticizing his former boss, President Obama, over his handling of world conflicts.
contentencoded:
Former Defense Secretary and CIA director Leon Panetta is all over the media this week to promote his new book “Worthy Fights.”

And he’s heaping criticism on his former boss, President Obama, for how the president is handling world conflicts.
